title: Council UI
summary: WhatsApp-style group chat interface for 7 AI personas to debate ideas. Real-time visibility, typing indicators, configurable rounds with timers, Armaan can spectate or participate. Outputs go directly to Idea Bank. Not about building â€” about ideation and refinement.
why:
**The Problem:**
Current council orchestration requires manual broadcasting, tracking state, compiling votes. Armaan only sees summaries, can't watch the debate live or interject naturally. Sequential prompting creates bottlenecks. Session sync issues cause delays.

**The Transformation:**
Council becomes a product, not a script. Real-time group chat where 7 specialized AI personas debate while Armaan watches (or participates). Natural conversation flow with time pressure. One-click to start, one-click to save winning idea to Idea Bank.

**Why It Matters:**
- Ideation becomes a spectator sport â€” watch the debate unfold
- Quality ideas through structured disagreement
- Different lenses catch different problems
- Position changes signal real deliberation
- Armaan can redirect, clarify, inject ideas without breaking flow
- Populates Idea Bank with vetted, stress-tested concepts

**Origin:** Built and tested council architecture on Feb 2, 2026. 7 agents, 6 rounds, produced Context Resurrection idea through genuine debate with position changes. This UI productizes that process.
flow:
**User Flow:**

1. **Start New Council**
   - Click 'New Council' button
   - Choose round template (Standard/Quick/Free-for-all) or customize
   - Set round durations (default 3-5 min each)
   - Optional: Load specific context (project, problem statement)
   - Click 'Start'

2. **Council Runs**
   - All 7 agents spawn with personas + context loaded
   - Round 1 begins, Visionary proposes
   - Other agents see proposal, react through their lenses
   - Timer counts down, visible to all
   - At 30 seconds: 'Wrap up' prompt injected
   - Round auto-advances when timer expires

3. **Armaan Participation (Optional)**
   - Watch silently as spectator
   - OR type message to interject
   - Timer auto-pauses when Armaan speaks
   - Can @mention specific agent for direct question
   - Agents respond to Armaan while staying in character
   - Timer resumes after agents address Armaan's input

4. **Council Completes**
   - Final round produces MVP spec or recommendation
   - 'Save to Idea Bank' button appears
   - Click to export: title, summary, why, implementation, UX
   - Idea created with tags: council-generated, [topic]

5. **Review (Later)**
   - Session saved to history
   - Can replay past councils
   - Can fork a council (restart from specific point)

**Message Flow (Technical):**
```
Agent responds â†’ Council Service receives
                      â†“
         Broadcasts to 6 other agents + UI
                      â†“
         Other agents see in their context
                      â†“
         Any agent can respond (within round rules)
                      â†“
         UI updates in real-time via WebSocket
```
implementation:
**Tech Stack:**

**Backend (Node.js + Express):**
- Socket.io for real-time WebSocket communication
- Clawdbot API client (sessions_spawn, sessions_send)
- Timer service (custom, runs server-side)
- State machine for round/phase management
- Mission Control API client for idea bank integration

**Frontend (React + Tailwind):**
- Custom chat UI (not library â€” need full control for timer, rounds)
- Socket.io-client for real-time updates
- Timer display component with visual countdown
- Round configuration panel
- Agent avatars with status indicators
- Sidebar with agent list + actions

**Why Custom Chat UI:**
- Libraries don't support: timer integration, round markers, pause states
- MC already uses Tailwind â€” keeps style consistent
- Full control over message rendering
- Can add council-specific features (round headers, wrap-up indicators)

---

**Model Allocation (Final Decision):**

| Agent | Model | Reasoning |
|-------|-------|----------|
| Visionary | claude-opus-4 | Creative leaps, transformation, novel connections |
| Critic | claude-opus-4 | Deep flaw detection, finding non-obvious holes |
| Behavioral Realist | claude-opus-4 | Understanding Armaan, predicting actual behavior |
| Pragmatist | claude-sonnet-4 | Binary buildability check, clear criteria |
| Pattern Archaeologist | claude-sonnet-4 | Systematic pattern matching from data |
| Systems Architect | claude-sonnet-4 | Technical integration analysis |
| Cognitive Load Specialist | claude-sonnet-4 | Framework application (passive vs active) |

**Rationale:** Opus (3) for roles needing deep understanding or creative reasoning. Sonnet (4) for systematic/framework-based evaluation. No word caps â€” let agents say what they need. Time pressure creates natural urgency.

---

**Data Models (TypeScript):**

```typescript
interface CouncilSession {
  id: string;
  status: 'configuring' | 'running' | 'paused' | 'completed';
  createdAt: Date;
  config: {
    rounds: Round[];
    freeForAll: boolean;
    contextPrompt?: string; // Optional problem statement
  };
  agents: AgentInstance[];
  messages: Message[];
  currentRound: number;
  timerState: {
    remaining: number; // seconds
    paused: boolean;
    pausedBy?: 'armaan' | 'system';
  };
  output?: {
    ideaId?: string;
    summary?: string;
    winningProposal?: string;
  };
}

interface Round {
  name: string;
  durationSeconds: number;
  prompt: string;
  wrapUpPrompt?: string; // Injected at 30s remaining
  wrapUpSent?: boolean;
}

interface AgentInstance {
  role: string;
  model: 'opus' | 'sonnet';
  sessionKey: string; // Clawdbot session reference
  status: 'idle' | 'typing' | 'waiting';
  persona: string;
  emoji: string; // For avatar
}

interface Message {
  id: string;
  timestamp: Date;
  author: string; // agent role or 'armaan'
  content: string;
  round: number;
  replyTo?: string; // @mention target
  isSystemMessage?: boolean; // Round transitions, wrap-up prompts
}
```

---

**API Endpoints:**

```
POST   /api/council/sessions              Create new council
GET    /api/council/sessions              List all sessions
GET    /api/council/sessions/:id          Get session state
POST   /api/council/sessions/:id/start    Start council (spawn agents)
POST   /api/council/sessions/:id/pause    Pause timer
POST   /api/council/sessions/:id/resume   Resume timer
POST   /api/council/sessions/:id/message  Armaan sends message
POST   /api/council/sessions/:id/advance  Force advance to next round
POST   /api/council/sessions/:id/end      End session early
GET    /api/council/sessions/:id/export   Export to idea bank
DELETE /api/council/sessions/:id          Delete session

GET    /api/council/personas              List all personas
GET    /api/council/personas/:role        Get specific persona
PUT    /api/council/personas/:role        Update persona

GET    /api/council/templates             List round templates
POST   /api/council/templates             Create custom template

WebSocket Events:
- council:connect     Client connected
- council:message     New message from agent or Armaan
- council:typing      Agent typing status changed
- council:timer       Timer tick (every second)
- council:round       Round changed
- council:status      Session status changed
- council:agent       Agent status changed
- council:error       Error occurred
```

---

**Default Round Templates:**

```javascript
// Standard (tested, works well)
const STANDARD_ROUNDS = [
  {
    name: "Proposals",
    durationSeconds: 300,
    prompt: "Visionary: Propose 2-3 distinct tool ideas. For each: name, one-liner, why valuable, what becomes possible.",
    wrapUpPrompt: "30 seconds remaining. Finalize your proposals."
  },
  {
    name: "Reactions",
    durationSeconds: 300,
    prompt: "All agents: React to the proposals through your specific lens. Be direct.",
    wrapUpPrompt: "30 seconds. Final reactions."
  },
  {
    name: "Defense",
    durationSeconds: 180,
    prompt: "Visionary: Address the council's concerns. Concede where valid, push back where wrong.",
    wrapUpPrompt: "Wrap up your defense."
  },
  {
    name: "Narrow",
    durationSeconds: 180,
    prompt: "All agents: Vote for top 2 ideas. Brief reasoning.",
    wrapUpPrompt: "Final votes."
  },
  {
    name: "Debate",
    durationSeconds: 300,
    prompt: "Stress-test the top 2 finalists. Attack, defend, evolve.",
    wrapUpPrompt: "Converge on a winner."
  },
  {
    name: "MVP Scope",
    durationSeconds: 300,
    prompt: "Define the minimum viable version. Trigger, data sources, output, what's OUT of scope.",
    wrapUpPrompt: "Finalize the spec."
  }
];

// Quick (15 min)
const QUICK_ROUNDS = [
  {
    name: "Pitch",
    durationSeconds: 180,
    prompt: "Visionary: One idea. Make it count."
  },
  {
    name: "Rapid Fire",
    durationSeconds: 300,
    prompt: "All: Quick reactions. No essays. Hit the key points."
  },
  {
    name: "Decision",
    durationSeconds: 180,
    prompt: "Converge: Yes or no? If yes, define scope. If no, why?"
  }
];

// Free-for-all (no rounds)
const FREE_FOR_ALL = {
  freeForAll: true,
  initialPrompt: "Open discussion. No rounds, no timer. Converge when ready. Armaan will call it when done."
};
```

---

**Latency Expectations:**

| Model | Expected Response Time | Notes |
|-------|----------------------|-------|
| Sonnet | 5-10 seconds | Acceptable for chat UX |
| Opus | 15-20 seconds | Longer but worth it for key roles |

**UX Mitigation:**
- Typing indicators show immediately ("[Critic] is typing...")
- Messages appear complete (no word-drip streaming)
- Multiple agents can be "typing" simultaneously
- Feels like a group chat where people think before responding
ux:
**Core UX Principles:**

1. **Full Messages Only**
   - No ChatGPT-style word streaming
   - Messages appear complete, like text messages
   - Typing indicator shows activity
   - "[Agent] is typing..." â†’ (5-15 seconds) â†’ Full message drops

2. **Timer Always Visible**
   - Countdown in header: "Round 2: Reactions â€” 3:42 remaining"
   - Color changes: green (>60s) â†’ yellow (30-60s) â†’ red (<30s)
   - Pulse animation in final 10 seconds

3. **Auto-Pause on Interject**
   - When Armaan types, timer pauses automatically
   - Visual indicator: "â¸ï¸ Timer paused â€” Armaan is speaking"
   - Resumes when agents finish addressing Armaan
   - No unfair time penalty for participation

4. **@ Mentions**
   - Type "@" to see agent dropdown
   - Click agent name in sidebar to quick-mention
   - Mentioned agent gets prompt: "Armaan asked you directly: [message]"
   - Other agents see it but know it's directed

5. **Round Transitions**
   - Visual separator in chat: "â•â•â• Round 3: Defense â•â•â•"
   - System message with round prompt
   - Smooth scroll to new content

6. **Agent Status**
   - Sidebar shows all 7 agents
   - Status dot: ðŸŸ¢ idle, ðŸŸ¡ typing, âšª waiting
   - Model badge: "Opus" or "Sonnet"
   - Click to @mention

7. **Wrap-Up Prompts**
   - At 30s remaining, system injects: "â° 30 seconds remaining. Wrap up your thoughts."
   - Agents see this and naturally conclude
   - Creates urgency without cutting off mid-thought
